meanings.definition: The act of enacting or putting into practice.
meanings.sent1: The enactment of the play was a success.
meanings.sent2: The enactment of new rules made everyone happy.
meanings.sent3: The enactment of the dance routine brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The enactment of the plan was like watching a well-choreographed performance.
meanings.sent5: The enactment of the scene was so realistic that it felt like being in a movie.

meanings.definition: A law or ordinance that has been officially passed.
meanings.sent1: The enactment of the new traffic law caused some confusion.
meanings.sent2: The enactment of the policy was a significant moment for the community.
meanings.sent3: The enactment of the silly hat law made everyone wear funny headgear.
meanings.sent4: The enactment of the regulation was like drawing a line in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The enactment of the decree was as powerful as a king's command.
